import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export const Register = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ fullname: "", email: "", city: "", password: "", confirmPassword: "", }); console.log(data); const handleOnChange = () => { const {name, value} = e.target setData((preve) => { return{ ...preve, [name] : value } }) }; return (

Email is required
City is required
Password is required
Password didn't match
  
Already have an Account? Login
); };
